title: Person Of Interest - Best scene of the show so far
author: Sifar Sk
comment:
The entire episode is my favourite, and shows the best of all the main characters - Of which I count Elias as one, even if (officially) recurring.

I binge this episode the most.
This scene always brings me to tears.  I would only hope that we all have friends who care about us this much.
Yep, that look on Reese's face and the movement of the camera as he marches on.  😯
Just realized that the machine gave finch the number of the hr cop cause he's essentially dead already

Started watching  PoI late. Man it was a great show, and this episode, amazing scenes from the beggining of it. The only better one in my opinion was the one, with the machine couting the possibilties, and to the The Glitch Mob  - Fortune Days.
